body_html:
Latest commit makes it build but I have to rebase onto master (and reapply all changes since then on cudnn). I haven't actually tested this code at all yet :)

Biggest further substantive change on the last patch is, we do some more geometry calculation in convolution backwards, when previously it was done by saving sizes from forwards and then reusing them as needed.

body:
Latest commit makes it build but I have to rebase onto master (and reapply all changes since then on cudnn). I haven't actually tested this code at all yet :)

Biggest further substantive change on the last patch is, we do some more geometry calculation in convolution backwards, when previously it was done by saving sizes from forwards and then reusing them as needed.
